business_rules.definition: All time-based operations and data storage must adhere to the Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh (Vietnam) timezone standard.
Username, Email, Staff Code, and Roll Number must be unique across the system.
Major Code and Major Name must be unique.
Semester Code and Semester Name must be unique.
Subject Code must be unique.
A subject must be linked to at least one major upon creation.
Room Name must be unique.
Camera Name and RTSP URL must be unique across the system.
A camera must be assigned to an existing room.
A slot cannot be deactivated if its scheduled start time has arrived or if it already contains Present or Absent attendance records.
After the cutoff (23:59:59 Vietnam time), only the Data Operator can edit attendance records.
A slot's time range must not overlap with any other slot in the same Room.
A slot's time range must not overlap with any other slot assigned to the same Staff User (Lecturer/Supervisor).
Slot End Time must be strictly after the Start Time.
Slots must be assigned to an active Room and active Staff.
Only Lecturer and Supervisor can perform Scan and Rescan action.
Cannot delete a Semester if it has dependent classes.
Cannot delete a Major if it has dependent Students or Subjects.
Cannot delete a Subject if it has dependent Classes.
Cannot delete a Class if it has dependent Slots.
Lecturers can work with regular slots and PT (Exam) slots, while Supervisors can only work with Final exam (Exam) slots.
Lecturers and Supervisors can only work in assigned slots.
Import csv has 2 modes: add and update existing.
The system has 3 statuses for attendance: Not yet, Absent, Present.
Final Exam attendance only belongs to the slot, not to any class.
1 exam slot (Final Exam) can have many subjects.
There are 3 types of Slots: Lecture, Lecture with PT, Final Exam.
Data operators cannot create other Data operators.
Data Operator cannot assign roles related to Lecturer and Supervisor to a Student and vice versa.
Lecturers can only perform Scan and Rescan within the time range of the class slot.
Lecturers can manually adjust student attendance until 23:59:59 of the day with that slot.
Lecturers and Supervisors can only export data of their own slots and classes.
